app.name: HB App Store
app.long_description:
Homebrew App Store allows you to download homebrew apps for HBL directly in the app. Installed apps can also be reinstalled, updated, or deleted.
Music by (T-T)b (google t tb chiptunes!) Thanks to pwsincd, rw-r-r_0644, vgmoose, brienj, and dimok!
source code: https://github.com/fortheusers/hb-appstore
